entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Snow level 1600 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
